channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 17:38 Driven the threat of artebing to Pokrovskaya Territorial Community. Solve for further reports.
item.description: 🟢 17:38 Driven the threat of artebing to Pokrovskaya Territorial Community. Solve for further reports. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
